testcase.name: Successful Login with Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Login page.................................................passed When User enters "erp.maxgroup@gmail.com" into Username field...............passed And User enters "123" into Password field...................................passed And User Click LogIn button.................................................passed And User Login Successfully.................................................passed

testcase.name: Select User to Approver
testcase.system-out: When User Click Select User button for Approver.............................passed Then User Click checked button for Approve Chequebook Request first row.....passed Then User Click Select User button for Creator..............................passed When User Click Checkbooks button...........................................passed And User Click Chequebook List button.......................................passed Then User Verify the status is "active" for that Chequebook.................passed

testcase.name: User Fillup Basic Info form
testcase.system-out: Then User Clicks Create Checkbook button....................................passed When User Click Approver button and select Approver.........................passed Then User Select "ERP Admin" as Signatory Authorities.......................passed Then User set the DateMonth "0203" and Year "2020"..........................passed

testcase.name: User Fillup Bank Account Info form
testcase.system-out: When User Click Bank Name button and set "UCBL" bank........................passed Then User Click Bank Account button and set "0210589438" Account............passed

testcase.name: User Fillup Check Leaf Info Form
testcase.system-out: Then User enters "11111111" into Checkbook Number field.....................passed Then User enters "1111111" into Starting Leaf Number field..................passed Then User enters "5" into Cheque Leaf Count field...........................passed Then User Click CheckBookSubmit button......................................passed

testcase.name: Select User to Approver
testcase.system-out: When User Click Select User button for Approver.............................passed Then User Click checked button for Denied Chequebook Request first row......passed Then User Click Select User button for Creator..............................passed When User Click Checkbooks button...........................................passed And User Click Chequebook List button.......................................passed Then User Verify the status is "denied" for that Chequebook.................passed
